content.text: Kairiken is a bounty hunter at Sabaody Archipelago.
Kairiken is a large, tanned man with a prominent brow who wears a striped purple sweater and has a small afro perched at the top of his head.
As a bounty hunter, Kairiken is likely quite merciless. He was desperate enough to attack the Straw Hat Pirates but ended up losing miserably to them.
Not much is known about Kairiken's abilities, but as a bounty hunter he likely possesses some combat skill. However, he was easily defeated by Luffy.
Kairiken wields a large sword in combat. It was broken when he was defeated by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Bazooka.
Kairiken was first seen on Sabaody Archipelago with Minoruba and other bounty hunters. The group attacked the Straw Hat Pirates in an attempt to claim their bounties, but were defeated.
He and Minoruba later visited Peterman, the leader of a kidnapping gang. After they informed him of Camie being a mermaid, Peterman offered the two a 10% cut of her final selling price.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 51 Chapter 498 (p. 2-4), Kairiken debuts.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary, Kairiken's birthday is revealed.
↑  One Piece Blue Deep: Characters World (p. 215), his name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 51 Chapter 499 (p. 3) and Episode 393, Minoruba and Kairiken visit Peterman.
